recipe.title: "Ranchy" Labneh Dip
instructions: Whisk 2 cups labneh, 1 finely grated garlic clove, 1 teaspoon crushed dried mint, 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon lemon zest, and 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt in a bowl. Cover and chill 3 hours for flavors to meld.
